Info.Title: The Crazies
Info.Writer: Scott Kosar (screenplay), Ray Wright (screenplay), George A. Romero
Info.Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Radha Mitchell, Joe Anderson, Danielle Panabaker
Info.Plot: After a strange and insecure plane crash, an unusual toxic virus enters a quaint farming town. A young couple are quarantined, but they fight for survival along with help from a couple of people.
